doc:
Alex Descas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alex_Descas 0 Alex Descas (born 1958) is a French actor known for his roles in Jim Jarmusch films and for his role as Schneider in the French TV series Un Flic. He is a frequent collaborator of Claire Denis, appearing in her films No Fear, No Die, Nénette et Boni, Trouble Every Day, Ten Minutes Older: The Cello, 35 Shots of Rum and Bastards. He is of Antillean (Guadeloupean) descent. Alex_Descas ( born 1958 ) is a_French_actor known for his_roles in Jim_Jarmusch_films and for his_role as Schneider in the_French_TV_series_Un_Flic . He is a_frequent_collaborator of Claire_Denis , appearing in her_films No_Fear , No_Die , Nénette_et_Boni , Trouble Every_Day , Ten_Minutes_Older : The_Cello , 35_Shots of Rum_and_Bastards . He is of Antillean_(_Guadeloupean_)_descent .
